description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 1376387 Fleetway. The average
  contract duration was 0.64 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.2M. The longest
  contract was 0.64 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.4M.
